faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Bailo.
faq.contact.title: Didn't find your answer?
faq.contact.subtitle: Our support team is available to help you.
faq.a1: Bailo is a Belgian platform that allows landlords and tenants to rate each other. The goal is to create a trust history to secure rentals.
faq.a2: Profile creation and viewing basic reviews are free. Premium features may be offered.
faq.a3: Yes, Bailo covers all of Belgium: Wallonia, Flanders and Brussels.
faq.q4: Can I see a landlord's reviews before renting?
faq.a4: Yes, that's the principle of Bailo. You can view reviews left by former tenants.
faq.q5: How can I rate my landlord?
faq.a5: After your rental period, you can leave a review on several criteria: property condition, responsiveness, commitment compliance, communication.
faq.q6: What if I receive an unjustified bad review?
faq.a6: You have the right to respond. You can contest a review if it is false or defamatory.
faq.a7: Yes, Bailo complies with GDPR. Your data is never shared without your consent.
faq.q8: How can I verify a potential tenant?
faq.a8: Search for the candidate's profile on Bailo to see their rental history and reviews from former landlords.
faq.q9: Can I refuse a tenant because of a bad rating?
faq.a9: Bailo provides information, but the decision is yours. We encourage you to consider the entire profile and dialogue with the candidate.
faq.q10: How to rate a tenant after they leave?
faq.a10: Log into your account and leave a review on objective criteria: rent payment, property maintenance, neighborhood respect, communication.
faq.a11: No, Bailo is a complementary tool. Rental guarantees and insurance are still recommended.
faq.a12: Only verified users can leave reviews. We verify that the rental relationship actually existed.
faq.q13: What to do in case of abuse?
faq.a13: Report the abusive review. Our moderation team examines each report.
faq.a14: No. Bailo is a balanced reputation system, not a blacklist. Both parties are rated, and everyone can improve their score over time.

legal.terms.title: Terms of Service
legal.terms.s1.title: 1. Purpose
legal.terms.s1.content: These terms of service define the terms and conditions under which Bailo provides users with its mutual rating platform between landlords and tenants. By accessing and using the Bailo platform, you accept these terms without reservation.
legal.terms.s2.title: 2. Platform Access
legal.terms.s2.content: Access to the Bailo platform requires the creation of a user account. The user agrees to provide accurate and up-to-date information during registration. The user is responsible for the confidentiality of their login credentials and any activity performed from their account.
legal.terms.s3.title: 3. Services Offered
legal.terms.s3.content: Bailo allows landlords and tenants to rate each other after a rental period. Reviews must be objective, honest and respectful. Bailo reserves the right to moderate or delete any content deemed inappropriate, defamatory or contrary to these terms.
legal.terms.s4.title: 4. Responsibilities
legal.terms.s4.content: Bailo acts as an intermediary and cannot be held responsible for reviews published by users. Bailo undertakes to implement all reasonable means to ensure the availability and security of the platform, without guarantee of uninterrupted operation.
legal.terms.s5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
legal.terms.s5.content: All elements of the Bailo platform (texts, images, logos, source code) are protected by copyright and intellectual property law. Any unauthorized reproduction or use is strictly prohibited.
legal.terms.s6.title: 6. Modification of Terms
legal.terms.s6.content: Bailo reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be informed of any substantial modification. Continued use of the platform after modification constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.privacy.s1.title: 1. Data Collection
legal.privacy.s1.content: Bailo collects the following personal data: name, first name, email address, phone number, and identity documents as part of KYC verification. This data is collected during registration and use of our services.
legal.privacy.s2.title: 2. Data Use
legal.privacy.s2.content: Your personal data is used for: managing your account, verifying your identity, improving our services, communicating about your account and our services, and complying with our legal obligations.
legal.privacy.s3.title: 3. Data Sharing
legal.privacy.s3.content: Bailo does not share your personal data with third parties, except in the following cases: with your explicit consent, to meet a legal obligation, or with our service providers (hosting, payment) within the strict scope of their missions.
legal.privacy.s4.title: 4. Data Security
legal.privacy.s4.content: Bailo implements appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest.
legal.privacy.s5.title: 5. Your Rights
legal.privacy.s5.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights: right of access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, portability and objection. To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@bailo.fr.
legal.privacy.s6.title: 6. Data Retention
legal.privacy.s6.content: Your personal data is retained for the duration of your use of our services, then archived for applicable legal periods. Reviews are retained for 5 years after the end of the rental relationship.

legal.cookies.title: Cookie Policy
legal.cookies.s1.title: 1. What is a Cookie?
legal.cookies.s1.content: A cookie is a small text file placed on your device (computer, smartphone, tablet) when visiting a website. It stores information about your browsing and recognizes you during subsequent visits.
legal.cookies.s2.title: 2. Cookies Used
legal.cookies.s2.content: Bailo uses the following types of cookies: strictly necessary cookies (authentication, security, language preferences), performance cookies (anonymized visit statistics), and functional cookies (remembering your preferences).
legal.cookies.s3.title: 3. Third-Party Cookies
legal.cookies.s3.content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services used on our platform: traffic analysis tools and secure payment services. These cookies are subject to the privacy policies of their respective publishers.
legal.cookies.s4.title: 4. Cookie Management
legal.cookies.s4.content: You can modify your cookie preferences at any time via your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of some site features.
legal.cookies.s5.title: 5. Retention Period
legal.cookies.s5.content: Session cookies are deleted when you close your browser. Persistent cookies are retained for a maximum of 13 months in accordance with Data Protection Authority recommendations.

about.title: About Bailo
about.subtitle: We are revolutionizing trust in rental real estate by creating a transparent and secure ecosystem for landlords and tenants.
about.mission.title: Our mission
about.mission.content: At Bailo, we believe that trust is the foundation of any successful rental relationship. Our platform enables landlords and tenants to build a verifiable reputation based on authentic reviews and certified profiles. We want to eliminate the uncertainty and stress associated with property rentals.
about.values.title: Our values
about.values.trust.title: Trust
about.values.trust.desc: We place trust at the heart of our platform with KYC verifications and authenticated reviews.
about.values.transparency.title: Transparency
about.values.transparency.desc: Complete access to rental histories and reviews for informed decisions.
about.values.innovation.title: Innovation
about.values.innovation.desc: We use the latest technologies to simplify and secure the rental experience.
about.values.community.title: Community
about.values.community.desc: We are building a community of responsible and committed landlords and tenants.
about.story.title: Our story
about.story.content: Bailo was born from a simple observation: finding a trustworthy tenant or a reliable landlord shouldn't be an obstacle course. Founded by a team passionate about real estate and technology, our platform meets the real needs of the French rental market by bringing transparency and peace of mind to all stakeholders.
howItWorks.hero.title: Discover how Bailo works
howItWorks.hero.subtitle: An intuitive platform that revolutionizes rental relationships in 6 simple steps. Build your reputation and rent with confidence.
howItWorks.step1.title: Registration and identity verification
howItWorks.step1.desc: Create your account and verify your identity via itsme® to guarantee a 100% verified profile. This essential step ensures that all Bailo users are real people, creating a trusted environment.
howItWorks.step1.feature3: Verified profile badge visible to all
howItWorks.step2.title: Property management (Landlords)
howItWorks.step2.desc: As a landlord, easily add your properties to the platform. View your entire real estate portfolio, track rented and available properties, all from a centralized dashboard.
howItWorks.step2.feature1: Add properties in a few clicks
howItWorks.step3.title: View profiles and reviews
howItWorks.step3.desc: Before committing, view profiles of landlords, tenants and properties. Access reviews left by former rental partners to make informed decisions.
howItWorks.step4.title: Creating a rental relationship
howItWorks.step4.desc: The landlord initiates the rental relationship by selecting a tenant already registered on Bailo or by inviting them to join the platform. This step formalizes the link between the parties.
howItWorks.step4.feature2: Or invite them by email to join Bailo
howItWorks.step5.title: Centralized documents
howItWorks.step5.desc: All your important documents in one place! View and manage the lease, entry and exit inventories, and all other rental-related documents directly in the rental relationship space.
howItWorks.step6.title: Mutual reviews at closure
howItWorks.step6.desc: At the end of the rental, each party is invited to review the other. Reviews remain confidential until both parties have submitted their review, or after 15 days, ensuring sincere and balanced feedback.
howItWorks.step6.feature2: The tenant(s) review(s) the landlord and property
howItWorks.step6.feature3: Reviews revealed after both parties submit or after 15 days
howItWorks.reputation.title: Build your rental reputation
howItWorks.reputation.desc: Every successful rental strengthens your reputation. Bailo creates a reliable rental history that follows and values you. Landlords and tenants build together an ecosystem of mutual trust.
howItWorks.reputation.benefits.title: Benefits of a good reputation

howItWorks.reputation.benefits.item2: Negotiate from a position of trust
howItWorks.reputation.benefits.item3: Benefit from transparency in your rental relationships
howItWorks.reputation.benefits.item4: Contribute to a healthier rental market
